description:
"Let's go, together! Head for the goal, Diamond Friends!!"

The new anime will have a theme of "Aikatsu with your friends!" and will center on a new protagonist named Aine Yuuki, who is good at making friends, and is enrolled in Star Harmony Academy's general education track. She befriends Mio Minato, the school's top idol, and becomes an idol herself.

(Source: Anime News Network)

node.description: __Hiromi Kikuta__ is a Japanese sound director, who works for the company Rakuonsha.

[Profile](www.horipro-international.com/artist/musician/tadokoro) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/azusa-tadokoro) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/AzusaTadokoro) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/azusa_tadokoro/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/tadokoroazusaofficial)

She was a member in the tennis club at her middle and high schools, and she was also the general manager of the club in high school. When Azusa was in 8th grade, she was inspired to become a voice actress after hearing the Akiko Yajima's performance as Kohaku in Inuyasha. She participated in Horipro's 36th Talent Scout Caravan on October 11, 2011, was awarded as the grand prix winner and made her debut as a voice actress in 2012. In 2014, she made her official debut as a singer with the album "Beyond Myself!".

Azusa's hobbies including karaoke, impersonating, making albums, cooking and sewing. Her special skills include tennis - which she has been playing ever since fifth grade of elementary school - and arm wrestling, and she likes to stay healthy. She also loves both cows and movies, and has said that her ideal date would be either tennis or a movie so that she wouldn’t have to talk a lot. Azusa has four older brothers, and she went to the same high school as [Megumi Nakajima](https://anilist.co/staff/96105/Megumi-Nakajima)

(Source: BanG Dream! Wikia)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ayakaohashi) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ayaka_ohashi/)

A voice actor, singer, and the drummer of [Poppin'Party](https://anilist.co/staff/153185/PoppinParty). Ayaka was born in Saitama Prefecture but moved to Tokyo after kindergarten. She became part of a theater company in elementary school and appeared in commercials, stage productions, and TV dramas. After receiving some voice acting lessons in the company, she realized that she wanted to become a voice actress. She got scouted in 2011 by Horipro and began her career. In August 2014, she debuted as a singer with her single "YES!!", which was used as the opening theme for the anime _Sabagebu!_.

Her hobbies includes karaoke as well as watching anime, drumming, browsing the internet, gaming, watching sports, and reading light novels. She had drumming skills prior to joining the _Bang Dream_ franchise. Ayaka loves heavy metal and shares her love together with her mother, who used to sing Marilyn Manson's songs for her as lullabies. Her favorite bands are Evanescence, Papa Roach, and Slipknot. She also admires [Nana Mizuki](https://anilist.co/staff/95081/). 

Ayaka is also the voice provider of the VOCALOID4 voicebank, MATCHA.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
- Iansan - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Angelina - Arknights (VG)

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高橋晃_(アニメーター%29)

Affiliated with [Bandai Namco Pictures](https://anilist.co/studio/6116/). Noted for his work in the Precure franchise.

_Note: Not to be confused with the [other animator](https://anilist.co/staff/147908/)._

__Agency:__ Gekidan Himawari

[Profile](https://profile.himawari.net/view/1622) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/smileysuu) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/sumire__morohoshi/) | [YouTube](https://youtube.com/channel/UCTlieWyDS62ZGG3yMFswS5g) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sumire_Morohoshi) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E8%AB%B8%E6%98%9F%E3%81%99%E3%81%BF%E3%82%8C)

Sumire Morohoshi is a Japanese actress, voice actress and singer from Kanagawa Prefecture. She is affiliated with Himawari Theatre Group, and debuted as a solo singer under the record label Flying Dog.

**Non-Anime Roles**:
- Pela - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
- Yuni - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Product 08 - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Gallica - Metaphor: ReFantazio (VG)
- Yaiyai Yarucar - Bakuage Sentai Boonboomger (TV Series)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/2249194082)

Married to [Hiroki Mutaguchi](https://anilist.co/staff/128685/).

_Note: Not to be confused with the EMT Squared animator [Satomi Watanabe](https://anilist.co/staff/360609/Satomi-Watanabe)._
